changeSet.sql: create table lessons ( id serial, name varchar(100), description varchar(1000), course_idd int, room_idd int, lesson_date_start timestamp(0), lesson_date_end timestamp(0), extra_instruments varchar(1000), constraint pk_lessons_id primary key(id), constraint fk_lessons_course foreign key(course_idd) references courses(id), constraint fk_lessons_room foreign key(room_idd) references rooms(id) );
